name: Abbey Kuhn
text: The (new, I think?) female manager with the short hair gave me wonderful customer service. Made me feel very welcomed and made my pizza pickup a very quick and easy experience. Our team @ dogtopia love your crew!

name: Ed Halasz
text: October 24, 2020 - I ordered 2 large pizzas through their website with curb-side pickup.  Website said pizza would be ready in 20 minutes.  I arrived exactly 20 minutes later and notified them I was in the parking lot not once but twice, â€¦More

name: Roxane Newhouse
text: This HH is phenomenal. I wanted to use a coupon, but when I got there, they said I had to order online. I tried to order, but was having major difficulties. One employee tried to help with no success. The manager honored the coupons anyway and the pizza and cheesy bread were fantastic. GREAT STAFF-GREAT FOOD.

name: David Rowe
text: We all know their pizza, but I find that I really love their baked sandwiches.

name: Alisha VanEtten
text: Used to love this place, now apparently they partner with doordash in the morning and you can only use card. Extremely inconvenient, and the man I spoke to on the phone didnt tell me this until I finished ordering.

name: Kim Olson
text: Food was good and employees were nice, unfortunately two of the three employees were not wearing their masks.

name: Rowa Altattan
text: Sent me two completely burned pizzas and still havenâ€™t refunded me. Also arrived with doordash and the burned pizzas were stone cold.

name: Karen Koop
text: The ONLY place we order pizza from anymore <3 Love it!!!

name: Jake Silcott
text: Placed an order almost an hour ago and had the tracker still showing them making it. I ended up canceling the order. This was my first and last time placing an order here.

name: Donald Reach
text: Never burnt, always tasty, even after a day or two in the fridge. Friendly staff.

name: Tharley
text: Just ordered 2 xl pizzas. They were cooked perfectly. The staff is very friendly. They offered  me plates and napkins. And the young man held the door for me when I left. I highly recommend  this location. Keego harbor

name: Tdub Malace82
text: Worst hungry howies in the pontiac/waterford area. First they couldn't deliver on time like their website said. (40 mins) It took an hour. They didn't inform me until after I placed my order and was waiting 20 mins, that they didnt have â€¦More

name: Edgar Cruz
text:
Found out that Hungry Howie's will not deliver to Pontiac after 11pm.
It would have been nice be informed before waiting 45min then calling to inquire about my order just to find that out. â€¦More

name: zemog 37
text: Weâ€™ll slap me sideways and call me Bethany this place just delivered the best pizza I have ever had in my life this just made all my pizza dreams come true this just gave me an extra 5 years of life

name: Angelique Lantzy
text: I ordered a calzone with bacon lettuce and tomato,I received a calzone with lettuce cheese olives. When I called and asked for a new calzone they couldn't find my order and then refused to refund me,and when I got my new order it was wrong againfornew

name: patrick roy
text: Good pie friendly staff

name: Dylan Rodriguez
text: Took longer than and hour and I live like two seconds away and the pizza looked like itâ€™s been sitting for a while not the hungry howies to order from.

name: Jess Rice
text: We ordered a pizza tonight off of the website. We ordered a large pepperoni pizza, cheesy bread, and garden salad. We ended up getting a cheese pizza and we received our bread but no marinara.....we also couldn't get the free howie bread promo to work. Kind of disappointing. Usually have good service.

name: jasmyne lawrence
text: Worse hungry howies in the area! Every time I order from them something is wrong . Their managers donâ€™t know how to do their job and the general manger never comes to the phone I really really wish there was someone higher up that I could report them to. Go to the Waterford location it is much better!

name: Timothy Centers
text: Quality pizza. Everybody leaves happy.

name: Michael Easton

text: This place is worth visiting. They have large portions for fair rates. Constantly well organized and with great mood. Will come back again.

text: Great service friendly staff and hot pizza. What you expect from Hungry Howie's.

name: Johnny Doe
text: They've really fallen off over the last year. Pizza tastes consistency bad now, uncooked, not enough sauce, etc. I have to argue with them every weekend just to deliver to me. I'm done. â€¦More

name: Megan Sands
text: Called to try and get the best deals on a Medium Hawaiian pizza, and a Medium Deluxe pizza. I spoke with Anna...who was actually on her break when she answered. She was very cordial. She did not make me feel rushed. She answered all my â€¦More

name: Fady Fareed
text: The staff at this location are amazing  ðŸ˜

name: MarieClaireLucaMusic
text: They made the Best pizza for me today- perfect and delicious sauce. Great service here lately.

name: Ben Harrington
text: 2 large and bread for $40 and I have to pay cash. Who runs this place? Are employees scamming customers on a Sunday while you're drunk on a lake somewhere?

name: hannah sandel
text: This place is so so so so so so so yummy!!!!!!!!  They had a big deal and me and my boyfriend got lunch there got two Howie rolls for $3.71 very cheap and yummy!!  I always walk past and see deals they also have this thing where you put your phone number in and get free cheese bread!!!!!!  Love it super yummy

name: al izo
text: Average and typical pizza franchise

text: This is hands down the best HH around. Always quick, inexpensive, and tasty.

text: Great service at this location for years.

name: Jeff Richter
text: Thoroughly impressed w management.  Never been to  HH before. Extremely clean, prompt and courteous. Food was above average. Never put lettuce on a hot sandwich that isnt eaten immediately. Just wilts and gets soggy by the time you get it â€¦More

name: Tony Hann
text: You can never go wrong with a two topping $5 Pizza

name: Lucas L
text: lol I walked in to pick up an online order, had to wait a minute so the employees could finish there smoke break out FRONT. The whole place smells like smoke now. And my pizza was burnt af. it was good like 3 years ago though. was.

name: joel greene
text: Ordered the new cookie, it was burnt. Contacted them through email, there has been no response. I guess it's suppose to be burnt. My suggestion is, don't waste your money. STAY AWAY FROM THE HOWIE COOKIE!

text: Great place. Consistent quality. Fast orders and the pizza is ready quickly. Would definitely recommend! Called and talked to Jeremy, super friendly guy. :)

text: Nice clean environment. Staff was professional and  friendly. Pizza was fresh and taste so good. Honestly the best hungry so far.

text: Their food is always fresh and good. my family frequents this particular one because it's right around the corner. Tonight was the absolute worst service we ever received. We had it delivered and it came very fast as usual, our order was â€¦More

text: I first went into this store on 8/30/17 in the evening and asked the employee who greeted me if they had howie nowies...he proceeded to tell me that their is a little ceasers down the street. I then decided to order a medium pizza and he â€¦More

name: Stan Kieller
text: Came to this area 4 years ago. Tried lots of pizzas. Hungry Howies in Keego Harbor was the best. NO LONGER. Ordered two mediums and 20 wings. The pizzas had a minimal amount of the toppings ordered (for example: very few pepperoni), olives â€¦More

name: Tony Gorkiewicz
text: Why do they close at 11pm on a weekend? They don't open until after lunch most of the times, and then they close way too early.  The pizza is always good...within the hours that they say they are open.

name: Jamie Gottage
text: The worst. Lived here for 7 years and every time I get a delivery something is off.The "GM " david, is unreliable, rude snotty and disreguards our concerns. I have been a bar tender in keego for 4 years and when & if Jeff is there it's a â€¦More
